name: Lethal Tide
description:
Lethal tide is a game that was inspired by the classics of the platformer genre, enriched with physics and the ability to play two people on a split screen.

Game is characterized by a high level of difficulty and sometimes a few seconds can be decisive for winning, if you are looking for a game that will be a real challenge for you, Lethal tide is just such a game.

I encourage you to play the demo version, which is very extensive and contains over an hour of gameplay.
